    Package Description
    game.board
    Contains all files concerning the game board.

    Contains all files concerning corners.
    game.board.edges
    Contains all files concerning edges.
    game.board.hexes
    Contains all files concerning hexes.
    game.board.robber
    Contains all files concerning robbers.
    game.board.tokens
    Contains all files concerning tokens.
    game.player
    Contains all files concerning players.
    network
    Contains all files concerning the communication between client and server.
    network.protocol
    Contains all enums which define the Strings used by the protocol.
